entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who has a conversation with Ron. He is also the one who is going to play in the match.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who has a conversation with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is going to look in before the match.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a person who has gone down to the pitch with Hermione.

entities.name: smith
entities.description: Smith is mentioned as a person who Harry is going to play against in the match.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione have a conversation about looking in before the match.
Ron and Harry have a conversation about going out with someone.
Ron mentions Hermione in his conversation with Harry.
Harry knows that Ginny has gone down to the pitch with Hermione.
Harry is going to play against Smith in the match.
